author: max
name: Advanced
install_msg: Thanks for installing, once you load this cog it will replace your restart and shutdown with this cog. You can change all the messages in this cog with `[p]advancedset`.
description: This cog ask for confirmation if you want to shutdown or restart your bot.
short: Confirm if you wanna attept to shutdown or restart.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
